hero.title: We build websites and apps that bring customers
hero.desc: Webbie is your partner in digital growth. We don't just develop: we create tools that bring customers and increase revenue. Get a ready product in weeks, not months, with quality guarantee and support at every stage.

pricing.title: Choose the approach for your product
pricing.subtitle: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees. Every plan includes 30 days of support after launch.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to questions our clients often ask

contact.title: Ready to grow? Tell us about your idea.
contact.subtitle: We will respond within 24 hours and send a launch plan with budget.
contact.marketingText: We work on projects for clients from different countries. Each project is a unique story: from startups to large businesses. We create not just websites, but growth tools that deliver real results.
contact.marketingTextExtended: The Webbie team works with you in direct contact via Telegram. Every week we show progress, discuss changes and next steps. You see what's being done and can make edits during development. We don't promise instant results ‚Äî we work systematically: from task analysis to launch and support. Each stage is agreed with you so the result meets expectations.
contact.telegram: Or write to us on Telegram right now

full.title: Turnkey
full.desc: Complete turnkey solution: from design to launch. All stages in one team ‚Äî no subcontractor search, no delays, with guaranteed results.

fast.title: Fast start
fast.desc: Fast MVP launch: get a working product in weeks. Focus on revenue-generating features, not lengthy development.

scale.title: Scale
scale.desc: Without limits: expand functionality and integrate without rewriting code. Architecture ready for millions of users and complex business processes.

pricing.title: Starter
pricing.subtitle: Fast start for testing an idea
pricing.desc: MVP in a week: minimalist website with effective content and conversion focus. Perfect for testing an idea and quick launch. Clean code, technical SEO foundation and ready to scale.

pricing.title: Business
pricing.subtitle: Most popular choice
pricing.desc: High‚Äëperformance website with extensive functionality: admin panel for product management, user authentication, payment system integrations, sales analytics. Ready for active marketing and scaling.
features: CMS admin panel for content management

pricing.title: Scale
pricing.subtitle: Enterprise level
pricing.desc: Premium solution for ambitious projects: scalable architecture that grows with your business. Ready for millions of users and complex business processes from day one.
features: Modular design system: add features without rewriting code
Cross‚Äëplatform frontend: web and mobile apps in one project
Powerful backend: handle high loads and complex queries
Open architecture: integrate any services via API
Personal support: 30 days + monthly strategic consultations

faq.q: How long does a project take?
faq.a: We work fast, but with quality. MVP in a week, full e‚Äëcommerce ‚Äî up to 3 weeks, complex product ‚Äî from 3 weeks. Our experience shows: 80% of clients see first results within a week. After deep analysis of your business, we provide an exact plan with deadlines for each stage. Every project starts with a detailed spec that guarantees no misunderstandings or delays. We don't promise unrealistic deadlines ‚Äî we work efficiently and transparently.

faq.q: Can we edit content ourselves after launch?
faq.a: Absolutely. In Business and Scale plans, you get a powerful admin panel that works like a regular document editor ‚Äî intuitively and without technical knowledge. Edit text, products, categories, blog posts, images in real time without involving developers. Convenient interface, understandable even without experience working with technical systems. We don't just provide a panel ‚Äî we train your team: personal demo session, video guides, and detailed documentation. Result: you're completely independent in content management. In Starter, content is edited via code or we can add a basic admin panel.

We don't leave you after launch. First 30 days of support included in all plans: security updates, bug fixes, growth consulting, Core Web Vitals monitoring and performance, SEO optimization and analytics. In Scale plan additionally ‚Äî monthly strategic consultations and priority support. Our approach: proactive support. We don't wait for things to break ‚Äî we monitor your product 24/7 and prevent issues. Support details are fixed in the contract so you know exactly what to expect.

faq.q: How do you handle SEO optimization?
faq.a: SEO isn't an add‚Äëon, it's the foundation. We build it from day one using the latest practices: SSG/ISR for instant speed, structured Schema.org markup for better indexing, Core Web Vitals optimization (LCP, FID, CLS) for top Google positions. Result: our clients appear in search within 2‚Äì3 weeks after launch. Additionally, we provide a content plan, keyword strategy, and set up analytics to track positions. In Business and Scale ‚Äî full Google Search Console integration, XML sitemap, robots.txt. We don't just do SEO ‚Äî we ensure organic traffic that converts into clients.

faq.q: Do you work with existing systems (CRM, payments)?
faq.a: Yes, and it's our strength. We integrate your site with any systems: CRM, payment systems, analytics, email marketing. If you have a custom system ‚Äî we build integration to your requirements. All integrations are tested before launch and documented for your team. Result: your site becomes the central hub for all business processes.

faq.q: What if we need to scale the project?
faq.a: Our architecture is ready for millions of users from the start. We use a modular approach: add new features, mobile app (React Native for iOS and Android), expand backend, integrate additional services, add multilingual support ‚Äî all without rewriting code. We simply add new modules to the existing structure. Performance is optimized via caching, CDN, and horizontal server scaling. Result: your product grows with your business without technical debt or expensive rewrites. Our clients scale from startups to large companies on the same architecture.

We work with the most modern and reliable industry technologies. Frontend: Next.js, React, TypeScript for web apps; React Native for mobile (iOS and Android). Backend: Node.js, Strapi CMS for admin panels, PostgreSQL database. Integrations: GraphQL and REST API. Infrastructure: Vercel, AWS, or other platforms per your preference. Modern tools: Zustand for state, Framer Motion for animations. All technologies have large communities, active support, and long‚Äëterm perspective. We don't use outdated solutions ‚Äî only what ensures speed, security, and scalability.

faq.q: How much does a project cost?
faq.a: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees. Starter $250 (MVP in a week), Business from $500 (e‚Äëcommerce with CMS), Scale from $750 (enterprise level). After describing your task, we provide a detailed estimate broken down by stage and options. Final price is fixed in the contract before work starts ‚Äî no surprises. Payment can be per stage (before each stage starts) or split before start and before launch. Flexible terms are discussed individually. Our approach: you pay for results, not process. Every dollar is invested in your business growth.
